title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting
description: The bug report states that in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, it is mentioned that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. However, the observed behavior does not align with this statement. The expected behavior is clarified as follows: if the mentioned phrase in 7.1.1 is to be followed, the Reload link should have the custom cookie name in the URL, like this: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F. I will provide the steps to reproduce the issue and attach a war file that can be used for testing.
OB: The observed behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: The expected behavior is to have the custom cookie name included in the URL when clicking the Reload link: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
SR: Steps to reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
